attributes.action: Get Mrs May to resign because of her treason to our country
attributes.additional_details: in effect, become impossible to criticise Mrs Merkel’s welcome migrants politics without being at risk of being jailed for hate speech
attributes.background: BRITAIN DID sign a controversial new legislation proposal put forward by the United Nations (UN) which could see people who criticise EU migration policies jailed and makes immigration a universal human right.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions calling for someone to be given or lose their job. This would be a personal decision for the Prime Minister.
